H0.text: Which train is the holder of the world speed record for steam locomotives. Flying Scotsman

H1.text: Which train is the holder of the world speed record for steam locomotives. Blue Peter

H2.text: Which train is the holder of the world speed record for steam locomotives. Sir Nigel Gresley

H3.text: Which train is the holder of the world speed record for steam locomotives. Mallard

A4.text: Mallard broke the world speed record for steam locomotives at 126 mph (203 km/h) on 3 July 1938.
